p: The oils extracted from Mentha piperita were called MpH1, MpH2 and MpH3 because subjected to three different temperature ranges: H1 (14–32 °C), H2 (26–40 °C) and H3 (27–45 °C). The oils extracted from Mentha arvensis were called MaH1, MaH2 and MaH3 because subjected to the same temperature ranges of the other plant.
